hero_footnote: Creating Consistent Mercer Customer Experiences Around the Globe

items.text: We build products and create content for our audience, therefore we must know who they are, and look at our work through their perpectives in order to formulate strategies and objectives
All parties involved - strategic, marketing, creative, technical, get together to merge the knowledge of our audience and our business needs, we create a focused vision of our product.
By mapping the experiences of core users, we identify areas of strengths and weaknesses in order to come up with solutions and features based on empirical evidence and informed insights.
Making UI, technical, and creative decisions based on a shared, deep understanding of our core users from all parties involved can produce a more efficient and engaging workflow.

benefit1.text: Utilizing customer insights and opportunity analysis to define the user needs, and the business rationale by creating User Personas and User Journeys.

benefit2.text: Starting from a common baseline saves time across the facets of UI design; prototyping, visual design,  and UI development.

benefit3.text: Evolution’s tested code library allows teams to reduce time required for front-end coding and back-end integration.

benefit4.text: Evolution code is designed mobile-first and is responsive out of the box, ensuring successful deployments.

benefit5.text: The Evolution framework is frequently updated based on engagement metrics in order to maintain successful customer engagements across all touchpoints.
